extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     Level 3 and (PSYC205 or [PSYC271 and {PSYC370 or PSYC272}]).

basic.description: The neuropharmacological basis of psychological processes. Topics to be covered include drug actions on neurochemical systems, psychoactive effects of drugs and the neuropharmacological basis of psychiatric disorders.
basic.subject: PSYC
basic.title: Behavioural Pharmacology
